variable.name: FI294
variable.value: MAYBE MITRAL ANULAR CALCIUM (POSTERIOR) +-AF+-VPD+-SPD+-IVCD...BUT NOT LBBB
DYSRHYTHMIA POSSIBLY AFFECTING MOTION: AF,LBBB,LVCD (BUT NOT RBBB), PACEMAKER, JUNCTIONAL RHYTHM, SINUS PAUSES>1.5 SEC. (+-VPDS,SPDS,SVT, OR VT)
OTHER (E.G.,AORTIC ROOT CALCIUM WITH NO VALUE AR CALCIUM, RV WALL THICKNESS INCREASED..>5MM=MAYBE, >=6MM=DEFINIT. OR COMBINATIONS OF THE ABOVE OTHER THAN THOSE THOSE SPECIFIED.
